毨字的基本解释

毨
xiǎn
鸟兽新换的毛整齐：“厥民夷，鸟兽毛毨。”

毨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiǎn］
［《廣韻》蘇典切，上銑，心。］
亦作“1”。
(1)鸟兽毛羽更生整齐貌。
(2)指鸟兽的换毛阶段。

毨字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【毛字部】　毨； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页593第03
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?蘇典切，音詵。理也。【書·堯典】鳥獸毛毨。【孔傳】毨，理也。毛更生整理也。【正義】毛羽美悅之狀。夏時毛羽希少，今則毛羽復生，故言更生整理。【說文】仲秋鳥獸毛盛，可選取以爲器用。讀若選。包氏言，霜後選毛。與《說文》義同。　【集韻】或作?。

毨字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
毨字的起名意思

暂无。

Faint
Basic explanation of words
Faint
xiǎn
The new fur of the birds and beasts is neatly changed: "Jue Minyi, birds and beasts have faint hair."
Faint
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiǎn］
["Guangyun" Su Dian cut, milled, heart. ]
Also called "1".
(1) The feathers of birds and animals are rehabilitated and neat.
(2) Refers to the moulting stage of birds and beasts.
Faint

[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Su Dian cut, pronunciation. Reason also. 【Book·Yaodian】The feathers of birds and beasts. [Kong Chuan] 毨, the reason is also. Mao Gengsheng also sorted out. [Justice] The shape of hairy beauty. In summer, the hairy feathers are rare, but now the hairy feathers are resurrected, so the words are rejuvenated. [Said the text] Zhongqiu birds and beasts are full of fur, which can be selected as utensils. Read if you choose. Bao's words, choose hair after frost. It has the same meaning as "Shuowen".　【Jiyun】or make?.
